body_html: @facaiy made the point I wanted to make: TFGAN already supports dictionaries. Could you just use the namedtuple _asdict() function for the duration of the GANEstimator? I'm hesitant to support namedtuples, since AFAIK they're not support by default in many tensor conversion functions
body_text: @facaiy made the point I wanted to make: TFGAN already supports dictionaries. Could you just use the namedtuple _asdict() function for the duration of the GANEstimator? I'm hesitant to support namedtuples, since AFAIK they're not support by default in many tensor conversion functions
body: @facaiy made the point I wanted to make: TFGAN already supports dictionaries. Could you just use the namedtuple `_asdict()` function for the duration of the GANEstimator? I'm hesitant to support namedtuples, since AFAIK they're not support by default in many tensor conversion functions
